pathAssistantSteps.info: The approval process is finished, mark this stage as complete

A formal letter must now be sent to the applicant advising them they can not fundraise for Camp Quality.

A copy of the letter must be uploaded to the notes & attachments tab

Finalise the Campaign by unchecking the Active check box within 4 weeks of the ATF expiry date

Ensure all online fundraising pages are closed by the ATF expiry date

Log a call each time you attempt to make contact

Complete all fields within the RTF form from your conversation with the applicant

Mark this stage as complete to move to the next stage

Create a New Task to check in with the Contact 1 week before the event or a series of Tasks for regular check ins if the authority runs over a number of months.

Create a New Task to check in with the Contact 1 week post event

Create a New Task to review the received funds via the Campaign 1 week before the ATF expires

Online Request – must be contacted within 3 working day to complete the application details

Manual Request – complete all the relevant details on the form

Mark this stage as complete to move to the next stage

After ensuring all the details have been entered correctly, mark this stage as complete.

Your manager will receive a notification to review the application.

You will receive a notification either approving or declining the application
Thank the Contact appropriately and record it as a Task
